tool_description: Validates the overall survey structure for completeness, logical flow, question ordering, and adherence to survey design best practices, identifying potential issues and improvement opportunities.

survey_sections.description: List of survey sections in order

total_questions.description: Total number of questions in the survey

question_types.description: Types of questions used in the survey

has_logic_branching.description: Whether the survey includes conditional logic or branching

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

error_messages: Invalid validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict].
Target completion time out of range: Must be between 1 and 60 minutes.
Invalid question types: Question types must be recognized survey question formats.
Empty survey sections: Provide at least one survey section.
Total questions mismatch: total_questions must be a positive integer.
Industry standards error: If provided, industry_standards must contain valid standard identifiers.
usage: Provide survey_sections, total_questions, question_types, has_logic_branching, and target_completion_time. Optionally set validation_level and industry_standards. The tool performs comprehensive survey structure validation.

validation_issues.description: List of identified issues and warnings

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, minor_issues, major_issues

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated actual completion time in minutes
